20110120105050.000|20110120105052.000|CC1|AGAINST% AGAINST YOU NO N 20

20110120105100.000|20110120105102.000|CC1|>> WELL, FIRST OF ALL, LET ME   
20110120105102.000|20110120105104.000|CC1|JUST SAY, I THINK AMBASSADOR    
20110120105104.000|20110120105106.000|CC1|HUNTSMAN HAS DONE AN            
20110120105106.000|20110120105108.000|CC1|OUTSTANDING JOB AS AN           
20110120105108.000|20110120105110.000|CC1|AMBASSADOR FOR THE UNITED       
20110120105110.000|20110120105112.000|CC1|STATES TO CHINA.

20110120105116.000|20110120105118.000|CC1|HE HAS BROUGHT ENORMOUS SKILL,  
20110120105118.000|20110120105119.000|CC1|DEDICATION AND TALENT TO THE    
20110120105119.000|20110120105122.000|CC1|JOB.                            
20110120105122.000|20110120105123.000|CC1|AND THE FACT THAT HE COMES FROM 
20110120105123.000|20110120105127.000|CC1|A DIFFERENT PARTY I THINK IS A  
20110120105127.000|20110120105129.000|CC1|STRENGTH AND NOT A WEAKNESS,    
20110120105129.000|20110120105131.000|CC1|BECAUSE IT INDICATES THE DEGREE 
20110120105131.000|20110120105136.000|CC1|TO WHICH BOTH HE AND I AGREE    
20110120105136.000|20110120105139.000|CC1|PART SONSHIP ENDS AT THE        
20110120105139.000|20110120105141.000|CC1|WATER'S EDGE AND SO I COULDN'T  
20110120105141.000|20110120105142.000|CC1|BE HAPPY WITH THE AMBASSADOR'S  
20110120105142.000|20110120105145.000|CC1|SERVICE AND I'M SURE HE WILL BE 
20110120105145.000|20110120105147.000|CC1|SNUFF WHATEVER ENDEAVORS HE     
20110120105147.000|20110120105149.000|CC1|CHOOSES IN THE FUTURE.          
20110120105149.000|20110120105151.000|CC1|AND I'M SURE THAT HIM HAVING    
20110120105151.000|20110120105153.000|CC1|WORKED SO WELL WITH ME WILL BE  
20110120105153.000|20110120105155.000|CC1|A GREAT ASSET IN ANY REPUBLICAN 
20110120105155.000|20110120105156.000|CC1|PRIMARY.                        
20110120105156.000|20110120105202.000|CC1|[LAUGHTER]                      
20110120105202.000|20110120105209.000|CC1|LET ME ADDRESS THE OTHER ISSUE  
20110120105209.000|20110120105214.000|CC1|AND A VERY SERIOUS ISSUE.       
20110120105214.000|20110120105217.000|CC1|CHINA HAS A DIFFERENT POLITICAL 
20110120105217.000|20110120105220.000|CC1|SYSTEM THAN WE DO.              
20110120105220.000|20110120105222.000|CC1|CHINA'S AT A DIFFERENT STAGE OF 
20110120105222.000|20110120105226.000|CC1|DEVELOPMENT THAN WE ARE.        
20110120105226.000|20110120105230.000|CC1|WE COP FROM VERY DIFFERENT --   
20110120105230.000|20110120105232.000|CC1|WE COME FROM VERY DIFFERENT     
20110120105232.000|20110120105235.000|CC1|CULTURES WITH VERY DIFFERENT    
20110120105235.000|20110120105239.000|CC1|[INAUDIBLE] AS I SAID BEFORE,   
20110120105239.000|20110120105242.000|CC1|AND I REPEATED TO PRESIDENT HU, 
20110120105242.000|20110120105247.000|CC1|WE HAD -- WE HAVE SOME CORE     
20110120105247.000|20110120105249.000|CC1|VIEWS ABOUT CERTAIN RIGHTS,     
20110120105249.000|20110120105250.000|CC1|FREEDOM OF SPEECH.

20110120105251.000|20110120105254.000|CC1|FREEDOM OF ASSEMBLY THAT WE     
20110120105254.000|20110120105255.000|CC1|THINK ARE VERY IMPORTANT AND    
20110120105255.000|20110120105301.000|CC1|THAT TRANSCEND CULTURES.        
20110120105301.000|20110120105303.000|CC1|I HAVE BEEN VERY CANDID WITH    
20110120105303.000|20110120105305.000|CC1|PRESIDENT HU.                   
20110120105305.000|20110120105306.000|CC1|WITH PRESIDENT HU ABOUT THESE   
20110120105306.000|20110120105308.000|CC1|ISSUES.                         
20110120105308.000|20110120105309.000|CC1|OCCASIONALLY THEY ARE A SOURCE  
20110120105309.000|20110120105311.000|CC1|OF TENSION BETWEEN OUR TWO      
20110120105311.000|20110120105314.000|CC1|GOVERNMENTS.

20110120105316.000|20110120105319.000|CC1|THING THAT I BELIEVE SEVEN      
20110120105319.000|20110120105320.000|CC1|PREVIOUS PRESIDENTS HAVE

20110120105328.000|20110120105330.000|CC1|FOCUS ON THE AREAS WHERE WE

20110120112711.000|20110120112713.000|CC1|WE HAVE A MARKET-BASED CURRENCY 
20110120112713.000|20110120112715.000|CC1|BUT IT WILL ALSO BE GOOD FOR    
20110120112715.000|20110120112718.000|CC1|CHINA AND PRESIDENT WHO'S THE   
20110120112718.000|20110120112719.000|CC1|AGENDA OF EXPANDING DOMESTIC    
20110120112719.000|20110120112720.000|CC1|DEMAND.                         
20110120112720.000|20110120112725.000|CC1|IS R &B IS WORTH MORE, THEY CAN 
20110120112725.000|20110120112727.000|CC1|BUY MORE PRODUCTS AND SERVICES  
20110120112727.000|20110120112728.000|CC1|AND THAT WILL CONTRIBUTE TO     
20110120112728.000|20110120112729.000|CC1|CHINA HAVING GREATER PURCHASING 
20110120112729.000|20110120112731.000|CC1|POWER AND A HIGHER STANDARD OF  
20110120112731.000|20110120112731.000|CC1|LIVING.                         
20110120112731.000|20110120112733.000|CC1|THIS IS SOMETHING THAT CAN BE A 
20110120112733.000|20110120112735.000|CC1|WIN-WIN.                        
20110120112735.000|20110120112737.000|CC1|PRESIDENT HU IS CONCERNED ABOUT 
20110120112737.000|20110120112739.000|CC1|HOW RAPID THIS TRANSITION TAKES 
20110120112739.000|20110120112740.000|CC1|AND THE DISRUPTIONS THAT MAY
